categories.title: Body Composition
categories.short_description: Adjust your muscle mass and body fat sustainably.
categories.detailed_description: Work on visible and measurable physical changes while prioritizing metabolic health: increase muscle mass, reduce fat, or maintain stability according to your context and preferences.

objectives.title: Gain muscle mass
objectives.description: Increase muscle size and quality through strength training and growth-oriented nutrition.
objectives.stimulus_summary: This plan focuses mainly on hypertrophy training, and complements it with max strength work to build muscle mass.

objectives.title: Lose body fat
objectives.description: Reduce body fat percentage and total weight while prioritizing health, adherence, and visual change.
objectives.stimulus_summary: This plan focuses mainly on hypertrophy training, and complements it with max strength, aerobic conditioning, targeted intervals, and core stability work to lose body fat.

objectives.title: Body recomposition (Cut)
objectives.description: Maintain or increase muscle mass while reducing fat for a more defined and athletic look.
objectives.stimulus_summary: This plan focuses mainly on hypertrophy training, and complements it with max strength, aerobic base, interval, and core stability work to cut body fat while preserving muscle.

objectives.title: Maintain current shape
objectives.description: Preserve your current muscle mass, body fat, and performance without seeking visible changes.
objectives.stimulus_summary: This plan focuses mainly on hypertrophy training, and complements it with max strength, aerobic base, core, mobility, and muscular endurance work to maintain your current shape.

categories.title: Strength Performance
categories.short_description: Improve your maximum and relative strength with solid technique.
categories.detailed_description: Focus on absolute strength (powerlifting), relative strength (calisthenics), and general strength development with structured progression and technical control.

objectives.title: Increase max strength (Powerlifting)
objectives.description: Increase your absolute strength in squat, bench press, and deadlift.
objectives.stimulus_summary: This plan focuses mainly on max strength training, and complements it with accessory hypertrophy, speed work, and technical practice to increase your powerlifting total.

objectives.title: Increase relative strength (Calisthenics)
objectives.description: Improve your ability to move your body weight in weighted pull-ups and control skills such as planche or front lever.
objectives.stimulus_summary: This plan focuses mainly on calisthenic strength, and complements it with skill-specific hypertrophy, lever technique, and core stability work to boost relative strength.

objectives.title: Increase general strength
objectives.description: Develop overall strength without focusing on a single discipline through well-executed basic patterns.
objectives.stimulus_summary: This plan focuses mainly on max strength training, and complements it with hypertrophy, power, and core stability work to increase overall strength.

categories.title: Cardiovascular Performance
categories.short_description: Improve your aerobic and high-intensity endurance.
categories.detailed_description: Optimize your cardiorespiratory capacity with training focused on continuous endurance, specific paces, and high-intensity efforts.

objectives.title: Improve aerobic endurance
objectives.description: Increase your ability to sustain long, steady efforts by improving economy and aerobic base.
objectives.stimulus_summary: This plan focuses mainly on aerobic base running, and complements it with tempo and VO2 max efforts to improve endurance.

objectives.title: Improve anaerobic or high-intensity endurance
objectives.description: Develop the ability to perform short, powerful, and repeated efforts to perform better in intense or functional training.
objectives.stimulus_summary: This plan focuses mainly on glycolytic HIIT work, and complements it with VO2 max intervals, aerobic base sessions, sprint efforts, and injury-prevention training to improve anaerobic endurance.

objectives.title: Prepare for running competition
objectives.description: Train to improve times or complete specific distances such as 5K, 10K, half marathon, or marathon.
objectives.stimulus_summary: This plan focuses mainly on race-specific running endurance, and complements it with tempo work, speed development, and technique and injury-prevention drills to excel in competition.

categories.title: Functional / Hybrid Performance
categories.short_description: Balance strength and endurance to perform in mixed tests.
categories.detailed_description: Improve your overall performance by combining strength, endurance, and technique for functional environments, hybrid tests, or specific preparations.

objectives.title: Develop overall physical performance (balanced strength + endurance)
objectives.description: Improve your total capacity by combining strength, endurance, and technique; ideal for functional training, HYROX, or military tests.
objectives.stimulus_summary: This plan focuses mainly on mixed metabolic conditioning, and complements it with max strength, aerobic base, core stability, and strongman-style carry work to develop hybrid fitness.

categories.title: Mobility, Control and Wellbeing
categories.short_description: Move better, with more range and fewer discomforts.
categories.detailed_description: Increase your range of motion, motor control, and coordination to move fluidly, prevent injuries, and improve overall wellbeing.

objectives.title: Improve mobility and functional flexibility
objectives.description: Increase range of motion and body freedom to move fluidly and prevent injuries.
objectives.stimulus_summary: This plan focuses mainly on functional mobility work, and complements it with core stability and injury-prevention training to improve mobility and flexibility.

objectives.title: Improve stability, balance, and coordination
objectives.description: Develop body control, posture, and coordination to move with more precision and safety.
objectives.stimulus_summary: This plan focuses mainly on core stability, and complements it with postural control practice, functional mobility, speed and agility drills, and injury-prevention work to enhance balance and coordination.

categories.title: Power, Speed and Agility
categories.short_description: Be more explosive, faster, and more agile.
categories.detailed_description: Develop the ability to generate force explosively and improve movement and direction changes, useful for sports and advanced performance.

objectives.title: Improve power, speed, and agility
objectives.description: Increase explosiveness, movement speed, and agility in direction changes.
objectives.stimulus_summary: This plan focuses mainly on explosive power training, and complements it with speed, plyometric, sprint, and max strength work to improve power, speed, and agility.
